entry.title: The Sky Knows Our Names
entry.summary:
Author: AmongTheWisteria

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 934Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: “You knew,” Bruce says, voice breaking somewhere between accusation and relief.Clark smiles, unmasked now, eyes soft as dawn. “I hoped you’d see me.” When the mask slips and secrets finally fall away, Bruce finds himself face to face not with the alien he thought he knew—but with the man who’s been quietly saving him for years. In the quiet air above Gotham, between trust and fear, Superman becomes Clark, Batman becomes Bruce, and everything changes

entry.title: raison d'être
entry.summary:
Author: ilovepinkandcoffee

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,939Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 345

Summary: (n.) a reason for existingA year after the Riddler’s attack on Gotham, Batman struggles to repair a city fractured and drowning in crime. But when rumors spread through Gotham’s criminal underworld about an alien hero in Metropolis—an otherworldly figure with god-like powers who’s changing the course of history—Bruce can't help but be skeptical. But his concerns are confirmed when this so-called "Superman," arrives in Gotham one night during his patrol, bringing with him a wave of chaos that threatens to disrupt the fragile balance he has fought so hard to maintain.Clark had heard about Gotham City when he first arrived at Metropolis—a lawless, crime-ridden city plagued with corruption—but he had never felt the need to enter its borders. That is until he learns of a mysterious vigilante known as "The Batman," a figure who, like him, seeks justice for his city and its people, his curiosity gets the better of him. Drawn to the idea of meeting someone with a shared mission, Clark decides to seek out the elusive hero, after all, nothing bad can come out of it can it? But boy was he wrong.

entry.title: Smitten/Vulnerable
entry.summary:
Author: Caffinated_ghost

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,488Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 13

Summary: OFFICE AU - Clark Kent, due to mysterious circumstances, ends up not getting the job at the Daily Planet and because he's a little desperate and running out of money quickly, he applies for a job at Wayne Enterprises in Gotham as an assistant. Turns out the job was to be Bruce Wayne's personal assistant. Batman and Superman end up debuting in Gotham on the same night and people just assume they work together, Batman the brain and Superman’s the muscle. Superman is willing to be partners, Batman is on the fence.“Dear Clark Kent, we regret to inform you that we’ve decided to go with another candidate and wish you the best of luck with future opportunities…” Clark trailed off, reading from an email that the Daily Planet had just sent him. “That’s the seventh one this month,” Clark sighed, “I thought this one would be it.”

Author: Ekkolocation

entry.title: the door's about to open (i'm about to fall for you)
entry.summary:
Author: brucewaynessluttyboots (missakwatson)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,237Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 122

Summary: “What day are you heading home for Thanksgiving?” As Clark clicked through his calendar, he tallied the days left until he could start the long drive back to Smallville. “I—” Bruce glanced at his own screen. “I’m staying here.” “You’re—here?” Bruce just nodded, and Clark realized a second too late that holidays might not be a benign topic. He’d assumed Bruce had someone—grandparents, cousins, even family friends—to spend his breaks with. But now that Clark thought about it, hadn’t he mentioned staying in Metropolis over the summer, too? “Come back with me, then.” ***Or: Clark Kent succumbs to the overwhelming urge to invite his new friend Bruce Wayne to join him for his family's Thanksgiving. Clark is in law school, Bruce is a reluctant MBA student, and there's no way either of them is getting out of this without a giant, slightly inconvenient crush.
